New Records: The Celtics have made 68 3-pointers through their first three games of the season, shattering the previous record held by the 2021 Knicks (54)
Joker For 3: Jokić set a career-high with seven 3s made, becoming the first player in Nuggets history to post at least 40 points and seven 3s in a game
Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 16 points during a 21-0 Lakers run to open the 4th quarter to tilt the game back in L.A.'s favor
Anthony Davis drained a clutch 3 with 38 seconds left to give him his third straight 30+ point game to open the season
Domantas Sabonis (29 pts, 12 reb, 10 ast) and LeBron (32 pts, 14 reb, 10 ast) each posted triple-doubles
Pre-Game Insights: Experts favored the Lakers to win based on their recent performance
Coach Steve Kerr emphasized the importance of strong perimeter defense
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the comeback win
AD’s Key To The 3-0 Start: “Minnesota, Phoenix, Sac. A tough way to start but we found a way to get it done … LeBron Raymone James.”
Miscellaneous Highlights: The duel between Kevin Durant and Giannis Antetokounmpo was highlighted as the key matchup
This was the 100th meeting between the Lakers and the Kings
Others: The Pacers host the Sixers (3:30 ET) to open up a five-game slate on NBA League Pass featuring four of NBA.com’s MVP candidates to watch.
The Heat will honor Dwyane Wade with a statue outside their home arena tonight in Miami.
